Pudge Wars Reborn is a custom MOBA game created for Dota 2 using the Dota 2 Workshop Tools. It is a remake of the classic Pudge Wars map from Warcraft III. Developed by Insight, it was released on December 31, 2020.
Gameplay
Pudge Wars Reborn features 5v5 team battles where all players control modified versions of the hero Pudge. Key features include:
* Simplified mechanics focusing on the Meat Hook ability
* Square map divided by an impassable river
* Item and upgrade system
* Multiple game modes with different kill limits (25/50/75/100/150)
* Cosmetic item shop and daily bonus system
Core mechanics
* Hook: Primary ability that instantly kills opponents on hit
* Item system: Special items that modify gameplay
* Ability books: Grant new skills
* Shop: Monetization system with cosmetic items
Development
The game was released on December 31, 2020. Major development milestones:
* 2021: Added seasonal maps and new items
* 2022-2023: Balance improvements and bug fixes
* 2024: Implemented in-game shop and ranking system
* 2025: Introduced monetization and daily bonuses
Reception and popularity
Pudge Wars Reborn gained recognition among Dota 2 custom game enthusiasts. At its peak, the game had 3,026 concurrent players.
